notifications.linkText: See the full list of changes since 8.0.0
notifications.body:
Vaadin Framework 8.0.4 is now available.

The release contains several bugfixes and documentation improvements. The release also contain a major Grid performance optimisation. There are in total 97 changes landed since the 8.0.0 and some changes contain multiple improvements. Some of the changes were fixes cherry picked from the older 7.7 branch.

Using the latest bugfix version is suggested for all Framework 8 users.
notifications.title: Vaadin Framework 8.0.4 released

notifications.body: Subscribe to the new Vaadin Prime package and get access to all online trainings for your entire team and save thousands during your first year!
notifications.title: Buy Prime before May, get trainings for free!

notifications.body: Want to meet other Vaadin developers in Spain and hear the latest in good company while having something to eat and drink?
notifications.title: Join Meetup Group Spain

notifications.body: Vaadin Framework, Vaadin Framework Best Practices, and Vaadin Framework Client-Side trainings are coming to Madrid, Spain in June.
notifications.title: Vaadin Trainings in Madrid, Spain

notifications.body:
Want to have a Vaadin presentation at your local event? We've received really good feedback and are happy to join you and your group as well – let's schedule it together!

Contact Vaadin Advocate Ville Ingman at ville@vaadin.com for more info.
notifications.title: Speech at your meetup or company?
